startingPosition.instruction: Sit with the legs outstretched in front. Feet together. Hands besides the buttocks. Spine Straight.

technique.instruction: Bend the right knee, bring the thigh closer to the chest, heel near the groin, interlock the hands fingers under the right thigh and raise the foot from the ground
Inhale and straighten the right leg, pullling up the kneecap and keeping heel about 10 cms off the floor.
Exhale and come back to step 1.
Bend the left knee, bring the thigh closer to the chest, heel near the groin, interlock the hands fingers under the left thigh and raise the foot from the ground
Inhale and straighten the left leg, pullling up the kneecap and keeping heel about 10 cms off the floor.
Exhale and come back to step 1.

info: Deep breathing should be done and movement should be in sync with the breathing.
